pullrequest.title: load Utils.cmake again after calling find_package(ignition-cmake) to restore macros

content.raw:
the ignition-gui formula was depending on `ignition-msgs1` and `ignition-transport3` (which itself depends on `ignition-msgs0`). I just updated the formula to depend instead of `ignition-transport4` instead:

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/commit/76b8c6c7154d4e033f9df314c11fc0a2acbc6c50
content.html:
the ignition-gui formula was depending on ignition-msgs1 and ignition-transport3 (which itself depends on ignition-msgs0). I just updated the formula to depend instead of ignition-transport4 instead:

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/commit/76b8c6c7154d4e033f9df314c11fc0a2acbc6c50
